page.title: 10GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: The most popular games we play are {CATCHING Two teams make a{den and a dungeon. One team has to{run about}while the other team tries{to catch them.}The team that is{catching}put the other team in the{dungeon}when they are caught. If the{defending team}go into {den}they can not be caught. When all the{defending team}are caught the teams{swap over. {JEANIE TIG(CHAIN TIG) Someone shouts{"JEANIE TIG"}and everybody runs to put their{fingers in {a hole in the wall.}The{last person}to put their finger in is{"IT".}Same as ordinary{tig}except once someone is caught{they and "IT"}form a{chain}and try to catch{everyboby else. {Other popular games are football, {british bulldogs, snooker, pool, {bikes, kerbie, netball and tennis.
